meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful statuettes of animals.
meanings.sent2: She collected unique statuettes from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The statuettes on the shelf seemed to be having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her love for statuettes was like a garden blooming with tiny treasures.
meanings.sent5: The statuettes sparkled in the sunlight, each telling its own story.

meanings.sent1: The artist crafted intricate statuettes out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The statuettes in the art gallery were made by local artisans.
meanings.sent3: The statuettes in the garden looked like they were whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: His collection of statuettes was a miniature world of wonder.
meanings.sent5: The statuettes stood proudly on the shelf, each with its own personality.
